# DotNetBuildSettings.ProjectUsesSourceLink property

A function that returns true if the named project uses SourceLink.

```csharp
public Func<string, bool> ProjectUsesSourceLink { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

If not specified, all projects are assumed to use SourceLink. This property determines whether the `sourcelink` tool is used to test each package.
